#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cmath>
#define gc getchar
long long int read_int()
{
 	 char c;
 	 c = gc();
 	 while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = gc();
 	 long long int ret = 0;
 	 while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
 	 {
	  		 ret = ret*10+c-48;
	  		 c = gc();
     }
     return ret;
}

int main()
{
 	long long int l,res;
 	int t,i;
 	
 	scanf("%d", &t);
 	
for(i = 0 ; i < t ;i++)
{
     l = read_int();
     
     res = -2+(long long int)(sqrt(9+l));
     if((res+5)*(res-1) == 0)
     printf("-1\n");
     else
     printf("%lld\n",res); 
     
}
}
